author: Pixar
description:
"From the world of Inside Out, Disney Pixar series Dream Productions explores the work required to keep the studio inside Riley's mind up and running. In Part 1, "The Dream Team", Riley is growing up and dream director Paula must figure out how to age-up her productions. Watch the full episode here, featuring an exclusive interview with filmmakers Mike Jones and Jaclyn Simon. Dream Productions is streaming now on @disneyplus.

title: Dream Productions | Part 1: The Dream Team (+ Exclusive Filmmaker Intro) | Disney+ Original Series
